entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
